text.language: Ntefc~mou e~ron t/ren: n~teftoubo n~nenh/t: n~teftal[o n~niswni: n~te nen'u,/ nem nencwma.
May He bless us all, and purify our hearts, and heal the sicknesses, of our souls and bodies.

language.div: Kiranya Dia berkati kita, dan sucikan hati kita, dan sembuhkan penyakit, jiwa dan tubuh kita.

text.language: ليباركنا كلنا ويطهر قلوبنا ويشفى أمراض نفوسنا وأجسادنا.
